sightings.body: The Bigfoot in the Walmart parking lot told my dog the truth!
I met four UFOs at the Chili Fest. They were nice but one of 'em stole my drink tickets.
My uncle's dentist said he saw a guy in a Shrek costume in the woods, but it was probably a Bigfootses, probably.
Sometimes when I hear the bells, the angel says I shouldn't be afraid. I just wish it paid rent.
Mothman called me and told me to watch his movie. I did, it was okay.
My friend Bobby Ganish turned into a clockwork of pendulous eyeballs and said 'Be not a-skeer'd' and I said, 'you mean a-fear'd?' and then he ate my sandwich.
My girlfriend DM'd Mothman on twitter and he says there will be a great tragedy when the sun sets on the delta. Sold all my stock in the airline.
